statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, availability FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, availability FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY availability DESC, price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 25.00 AND 75.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, price, update_timestamp FROM products JOIN price_updates ON products.product_id = price_updates.product_id WHERE new_price < price
SELECT product_id, product_name, new_price FROM price_updates JOIN products ON products.product_id = price_updates.product_id WHERE update_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, available FROM products WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, price, available FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%pro%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT id, name FROM products WHERE price < 50 AND available = TRUE
SELECT p.name, p.price, a.updated_at FROM products p JOIN availability_updates a ON p.id = a.product_id
SELECT * FROM products p LEFT JOIN price_updates pr ON p.id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.new_price IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE availability = true;
SELECT AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM availability_updates ORDER BY update_time DESC;
SELECT id, name, price, availability FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC, id ASC
SELECT id, name, price, availability FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND price < 50 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, name, price, availability FROM products WHERE name LIKE '%apple%' OR name LIKE '%banana%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, name, stock_quantity FROM products ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM price_history WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, new_price, timestamp FROM price_updates WHERE new_price < 20;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_id, new_price, timestamp FROM price_updates WHERE product_id = 1234
SELECT product_id, old_stock_quantity, new_stock_quantity FROM availability_history WHERE product_id = 5678 ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT p.name, ph.old_price, ph.new_price, ah.old_stock_quantity, ah.new_stock_quantity FROM products p JOIN price_history ph ON p.id = ph.product_id JOIN availability_history ah ON p.id = ah.product_id
